name: Chipkoojs
tagline: Chipkoo (meaning sticky) is a jquery plugin to fix table headers.
body:
chipkoojs
=========

Chipkoo (meaning sticky) is a jquery plugin to fix table headers. Chipkoo does not need to know the total width of your
table. Once you attach it to a table, it automatically calculates everything that is required & makes the header sticky.

`  
            $(".js-fixHead").chipkoo();
   `
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
